name: part_012
file: tmp_【#ノエルのリリカルLIVE 】新たな団長を見てッ !【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [8DQWjvFBma4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: White Silver Noel performs her new song 'Lyrical Monster' on stage.
Noel speaks to the audience, thanking them for the live and sharing announcements.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: なんでリリカルモンスターって言ってたかわかったでしょ？
subtitles.english: Now you know why I called it Lyrical Monster, right?

subtitles.original: 最後まで盛り上がっていってね！
subtitles.english: Keep the excitement going until the very end!

subtitles.original: いつもとは違う風もあるよ
subtitles.english: There are winds different from usual

subtitles.original: そこがイイところ
subtitles.english: That's the good part

subtitles.original: どんな日も笑顔にするからさ
subtitles.english: Because I'll make every day a smile

subtitles.original: どんどん笑って相乗効果
subtitles.english: Keep laughing for a synergistic effect

subtitles.original: ニコニコ100点満点
subtitles.english: Smiling 100 points

subtitles.original: アラララLove & Peace
subtitles.english: Ala-la-la Love & Peace

subtitles.original: このままいくよ
subtitles.english: Keeping it going like this

subtitles.original: まだまだいくよ
subtitles.english: Keep it going more and more

subtitles.original: ついてきてよね
subtitles.english: Follow me, okay?

subtitles.original: Ring-Dong Ring-Dong みんななら
subtitles.english: Ring-Dong Ring-Dong, if it's all of you

subtitles.original: Ring-Dong Ring-Dong 出来るはずさ
subtitles.english: Ring-Dong Ring-Dong, you should be able to do it

subtitles.original: Ring-Dong Ring-Dong 聞かせて
subtitles.english: Ring-Dong Ring-Dong, let me hear you

subtitles.original: Ring-Dong-Dong 大きな声で
subtitles.english: Ring-Dong-Dong, with a loud voice

subtitles.original: Ring-Dong Ring-Dong 鼓動がBeat it
subtitles.english: Ring-Dong Ring-Dong, heartbeat is Beat it

subtitles.original: 期待もHeat up もっと感じて
subtitles.english: Expectations also Heat up, feel it more

subtitles.original: Jumping Jumping ディスプレイをJamming
subtitles.english: Jumping Jumping, Jamming the display

subtitles.original: ゆるふわ太郎　ハピネス太郎
subtitles.english: Yurufuwa-taro, Happiness-taro

subtitles.original: 異議反論は認めません
subtitles.english: Objections and counter-arguments are not accepted

subtitles.original: 史上最高の団長だから
subtitles.english: Because I'm the best Knight Captain in history

subtitles.original: ますますLoving
subtitles.english: More and more Loving

subtitles.original: 一緒にSinging
subtitles.english: Singing together

subtitles.original: It's Amazing!
subtitles.english: It's Amazing!

subtitles.original: リリカルモンスター降臨
subtitles.english: Lyrical Monster Descent

subtitles.original: はーい！新衣装と新曲お披露目ライブ、どうでしたでしょうか？
subtitles.english: Hi! How was the new outfit and new song reveal live?

subtitles.original: 楽しんでもらえたなら団長嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: Captain is happy if you enjoyed it!

subtitles.original: そしてね、ここでちょっとだけお知らせがあります。
subtitles.english: And now, I have a little announcement here.

subtitles.original: なんと！なんと！このライブ中にホロライブ公式スタンプ「白銀ノエル」が発売されました！
subtitles.english: なんと！なんと！ During this live, the Hololive official stamp "Shirogane Noel" has been released!

subtitles.original: もう現在ね、もうLINE多分買えると思うので、こちらもぜひぜひ買ってください。
subtitles.english: You can probably buy it on LINE now, so please do check it out.

subtitles.original: いーっぱいLINEしてください。
subtitles.english: Send lots of LINEs.

subtitles.original: まあLINEする友達がいない人は、団長とイマジナリーに友達になりましょう。
subtitles.english: Well, for those who don't have friends to LINE, let's become imaginary friends with the Captain.

subtitles.original: そして、後日このライブの感想会をするんですが、その時に...
subtitles.english: And, I'll be having a post-live review session later, and at that time...

subtitles.original: 団員さんの、まあビジュアルを発表しようと思います！お待たせして申し訳ございません！
subtitles.english: I'm planning to announce the visual for the fans! Sorry for the wait!

subtitles.original: 3Dライブ感想会で！団員さんビジュアルお披露目します！わくわく待っててねっ！
subtitles.english: I'll reveal the fan visuals at the 3D live review session! Wait for it excitedly!

subtitles.original: や、ぜひぜひ感想会も、うん、来てもらえると嬉しいです！
subtitles.english: Yes, I'd be happy if you could join the review session too!

subtitles.original: ではでは、他のね、いっぱいたくさんホロメンが素敵な配信をしてると思うので、
subtitles.english: Well then, I'm sure many other Holomen are doing wonderful streams,

subtitles.original: 団長はお暇します。
subtitles.english: so the Captain will take her leave.

subtitles.original: 皆さん、これからもよろしくね！大好きだぞ！ん～まっ！
subtitles.english: Everyone, please look forward to working with me! I love you all! Muah!

subtitles.original: 団員さんのおかげで新しい姿がもらえたよ♪ 不器用なノエちゃんだけどこれからもアイドルを目指してがんばります！！ Noel
subtitles.english: Thanks to the fans, I got a new look♪ I'm a clumsy Noel-chan, but I'll keep doing my best to be an idol!! Noel
